website_summaries.verdict: Many love this style update, but others say the change in Stride Rite's classic summer sandal design was not a good one.
pros: Comes in white, silver (Zappos and Amazon) and pink multi (Amazon)
cons: Ankle strap does not fit some correctly

customer_reviews.title: Not the same.
customer_reviews.text: My gals foot is in 1/2 sizes, and so the 11 1/2 medium width did fit with room to grow. However, this sandal is not the same as the previous SR summer fisherman sandal. The strap behind her foot was higher, so even when I tightened it to the maximum, her foot still wobbled. Although the older sandal version ran a shoe size too big, she could still wear it securely. So, I returned the sandal. It looks fine - it is possible my daughter's foot is too narrow for this shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Yoda Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Our 5th summer buying these cute, and toe protecting sandals!
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love these sandals. It can be so hard to find a rather supportive sandal that also PROTECTS THE TOES! I have bought this same sandal design every summer since my daughter was 1, so this is our 5th pair. I also like that it's not a real buckle, but velcro, so she can easily put them on herself. They're a cute pair of shoes and when they get dirty I can clean them pretty well with a baby wipe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These work great for the summer! Wanted something closed toe for daycare. These are stylish and get the job done. Only wish I purchased them sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: These are naturally wide and big
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is normally 7 1/2 w, but that was crazy wide. we had to go to 7 for it to fit, so keep that in mind. Otherwise, she likes the show. It has a Velcro strap (even thought that is not obvious from the pic) so my toddler likes to try and put them on her self. The foam support is amazing. My daughter can run and jump in these, but they are still cool enough for summer. She's been rough on them for about a week now, and they still look really white and holding up, the quality seems top notch.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Not as wide as I would have liked
customer_reviews.text: Very cute shoe, but not as wide as I would have expected. My daughter has what we love you refer to a potato feet, very squarish and wide, and these did not cut it (ordered a 6W). For a child with slightly wider feet this would still work nicely I think though.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and versatile sandal
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves her sandals. We’ve ordered these over the last few summers and they hold up to the daily wear and tear of childhood. We love the versatile style. They can be worn with play clothes, to the beach or even church dresses. Add to that the comfort of a sneaker and you have a winner, well worth the price, especially considering they still look great after she outgrows them so I can save them for baby sister. We did have to go up a half size as they ran a little small.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Witmer

customer_reviews.title: I love stride rite
customer_reviews.text: I love stride rite. I would rather buy less shoes that are good quality than cheap shoes that don't hold up or aren't supportive. These are excellent quality. My daughter wears wife in stride right but normal width in other brands. These shoes are very well made and don't seem to rub anywhere. They have have memory foam in soles. She loves wearing them. I like that the strap is velcro and not and actually buckle. No one has time for a buckle with a toddler
customer_reviews.author: Erica Stark

customer_reviews.title: They last, there comfortable we both love them
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been buying these for my daughter since she could walk! She’s now 6 and still loves them! I love them with a wet cloth you can clean them up and she’s always running they cover her toes so no trips, they have never broke or came apart, they always last till she grows out of them!! Never any blisters, or red marks from being new she’s always been comfortable in them!!
customer_reviews.author: Bobi

customer_reviews.title: These are great sandals!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are cute, classic, sturdy sandals. My daughter loves them and immediately remarked on how comfortable they are. They have a soft insole, a padded heel strap so no blisters, and they even have a fake buckle on the Velcro strap that not only keeps in line with the vintage look but prevents the strap from coming out making it easier for her to put them on herself.
customer_reviews.author: Zoe

customer_reviews.title: The worst - uncomfortable and give blisters
customer_reviews.text: We just loved Stride Rite white summer sandals in the past, but these are the worst! I wish they had kept the old design that we bought for years. My girls said the straps were too tight and they got blisters within an hour- never needed to break them in with the old design. Wish I had listened to other reviews. We returned these.
customer_reviews.author: Bruin Girl

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love StrideRite and these were very well priced and fit great. They also wear well and haven't shown any issues after a full season and our daughter is getting ready to wear them for a second one. She is very rough on her shoes so these are excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Karla

customer_reviews.title: Cute Sandals!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are very cute and of course comfy. They are a little on the big side, though - not sure if it's my daughter's foot or the size. Her size 10 Stride Rites were way too small, so maybe I should have gotten a 10 1/2 instead of an 11.
customer_reviews.author: D. Fanara

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!
customer_reviews.text: Stride Rite never disappoints! This sandal is not only adorable, but it's flexible, sturdy, and supportive. My daughter is two and wears these every day. The soles have a layer of memory foam and they flex when she walks. They also hold up to the wear and tear perfectly. Love them!!
customer_reviews.author: Tigerjayde

customer_reviews.title: Love this sandal!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third pair of these sandals I’ve ordered for my daughter. She’s worn them everyday summer, I just buy in a bigger size. I love the closed toe so she doesn’t trip while running. They are so durable and last all summer. I don’t think we’ve had a pair wear out on us. Definitely worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: We love these sandals and are so happy they are in ...
customer_reviews.text: We love these sandals and are so happy they are in larger sizes. My daughter has been wearing them since she was toddler. They work so well for rules at daycare and summer camp which required close toed shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael M. Mcnamara

customer_reviews.title: Kid tested, kid approved
customer_reviews.text: These are the only brand of shoes that I have found that are durable enough for my kids' daily use. By daughter wears these sandals daily; we are on our third pair in three years--a pair a year; she loves them so much, when she outgrows and out-wears one pair, we get the next size up.
customer_reviews.author: Cathryn Meyer

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: These are great and my daughter loves them. She has worn them all summer and they still look new. I love that they don't hurt her feet and she chooses to wear them over other shoes or sandals.
customer_reviews.author: Dani

customer_reviews.title: Love these sandals for my 2 year old!
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and my 2 year old seems to really like them! I’ve been checking for red marks on her feet but haven’t seen any and she hasn’t complained at all. I love that the toe is closed so I don’t have to worry as much about her hurting her toes when she trips and falls (which happens a lot...).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and Cute
customer_reviews.text: Out favorite toddler shoes for summer. These are the perfect toddler summer shoes. Yes, they’re a little pricey but they’re long lasting and won’t fall apart like some of the other brands. Highly recommend if you are shopping around for a sturdy pair of sandals for a newer walker.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly R

customer_reviews.title: Love Stride Rite
customer_reviews.text: I love Stride Rite and will hate it when my daughter out grows them. Their sandals are so durable and comfy for her. She has to have closed towed shoes only for school and I'm thankful for Stride Rite, one of the few children's shoes that actually have cute closed towed sandals.
customer_reviews.author: T. Hatziathanassiou

customer_reviews.title: A little big
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, just on the big side. She had just advanced almost past a 4.5 (in a stride rite shoe), i was surprised they were so big. Kept them anyway worth hope she will grow!
customer_reviews.author: M. V. Potts

customer_reviews.title: Not soft
customer_reviews.text: It runs a bit narrow. It looks cute but not as soft as I expected. Really like the look but have to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Ice Tempura

customer_reviews.title: Strap fell apart.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wore these once to a wedding and the strap on one of the shoes fell apart (the back peeled off). They also gave her bad blisters on her heel.
customer_reviews.author: Mvhb

customer_reviews.title: Instead of the closed toe sandal I received the open toe version.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the closed toe version of this sandal and instead I received the open toe version. My daughter already wore them and was to happy to have them so I decided to just keep them.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: Cute....while they lasted
customer_reviews.text: Loved that these came in wide sizes for my toddler’s fat feet. They held up well until a few days shy of 3 months when the Velcro came off of one of the straps and they are no longer wearable. After THREE months. Way too expensive to not even get a full season.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Very good toddler sandals
customer_reviews.text: Runs a little bigger than some others by the same brand. They are easy to clean, look nice enough for Church or like a summer wedding, and are durable enough to wear every day. My toddler has no trouble walking in them. She has been wearing them all but exclusively for 3 months already.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Batte

customer_reviews.title: Look great
customer_reviews.text: My 21 month old daughter loves these and chooses to wear these over other shoes she has. They look great with both summer dresses and play clothes and are easy to wipe clean.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa L.

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great but fits very wide
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are great for kids with chubby feet. Even tho I got the narrow it didn’t fit my daughters feet in width, it was super wide but it fit in the size so I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Viviane

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandals.
customer_reviews.text: Love stride rite sandals. This sandals give an moderate arch support to my daughter feet. Very comfortable .
customer_reviews.author: KARLA333

customer_reviews.title: Great for new walking toddlers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for my toddler. I buy her stride rite because she has trouble walking in any other shoe. These sandals were a perfect fit for her. So cute!!
customer_reviews.author: Aj Graham

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for summer play
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, very comfortable, no blisters or rubbing. Cool and breathable so no stinky feet
customer_reviews.author: SNK

customer_reviews.title: Perfect every day shoe
customer_reviews.text: Love the shoes. They dont fall off. Have protection for the toes. Very comfy. My toddler hasn't been tripping or slipping in them. Worth the money
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great for school. Still a sandal girls can wear to school when closed toe is mandatory! Very cute on. Good rubber sole for playing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter's favorite sandals since she was a little girl
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's favorite sandals since she was a little girl :) I always buy 1 size smaller because it does run a bit big even after using the SR measurements. Otherwise , this is a very well made sandals that can match most if not all outfit !
customer_reviews.author: Fashionmom

customer_reviews.title: Exelent . I recommend.
customer_reviews.text: The best sandals ever. I buy the 3d pair of this sandal. The quality is high and it is very comfortable. My daughter wears it each summer all day. I recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: love the closed toe for little kids
customer_reviews.text: classic summer sandals for little girls. love the closed toe for little kids. nice squishy memory foam soles, so will be comfortable for walking. these would look cute with white dress socks too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great sandal but runs half a size smaller than their sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Great stride rite quality but this sandle runs slightly small compared to the stride rite sneakers. I had to order a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Maribel

customer_reviews.title: These are great quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great quality shoes, but the wide is too wide for my child's foot even though I measured and used the Stride Rite size chart to determine what size to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: FierceMild

customer_reviews.title: Darling shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Precious shoes, but run a little narrow...will still fit an extra wide, but it’s close! Well made!
customer_reviews.author: The Kipfer’s

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, but daughter said they were too uncomfortable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Wished we could've kept these as they are so cute. Our daughter couldn't wear them, and they were a bit too big. Width was perfect though(! (we got a wide)
customer_reviews.author: Brook VB

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, cute, durable
customer_reviews.text: My little one loves these shoes. We’ve had 4 pairs already. Wish they still sold the pink ones because she was bummed when she got white and silver. They run 1 full size larger on us compared to our stride rite sneakers so we had to size down.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla Star Flores

customer_reviews.title: Cute sandals! Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These leather sandals are cute and are great quality! They were true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin E.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: cute but a little big. so they'll be cuter when my daughter's not tripping over them. haha
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Great sandals. I love Stride Rite leather shoes. They are very comfortable, easy to put on, beautiful. For my daughter who is 3.5 years old and wears size 8-8.5 they had some room to grow but still fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes and held up all summer!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes! My “almost 2 yr old” daughter wore these sandals almost every day this summer and they held up great. Stride rite shoes never disappoint and I don’t mind paying a bit more for a solid pair of shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NCMama2019

customer_reviews.title: Great shoes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality with a sturdy sole. My daughter really likes these and she has some room to grow in them.
customer_reviews.author: wkmoon

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sandal
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are our go to summer sandal. The are the perfect blend of casual and dressy and my daughter’s favorite shoes to wear. They do occasionally scuff but we wipe with a damp cloth and they are good as new.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best shoes ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best shoes ever. All 3 of my kids have worn these shoes until they could no longer buy sizes that fit. These sandals are chosen first every time. Kids love them. Easily worth the $.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystal

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little shoes but ran just a bit on the big side for her so we returned. Cute summer shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Kdperk

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but not really!
customer_reviews.text: They look adorable on the pictures, but what I got was a pair of bulky sandals. They run a bit big as well. Not too happy with the design, so I returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Timeless
customer_reviews.text: Classic. Beautiful and Timeless. Love the new memory foam! Yay Stride Rite.
customer_reviews.author: Kmomof 3

customer_reviews.title: Very cute looking sandal but not for a more narrow ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cute looking sandal but not for a more narrow toddler foot. My daughter’s foot was sliding all over and the ankle and heel part was extremely loose
customer_reviews.author: leslies

customer_reviews.title: It i s so great!
customer_reviews.text: It is impossible to say what I like the most b cause I like everything!
customer_reviews.author: Marina

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful shoes but bigger than expected. Will exchange for smaller.
customer_reviews.author: KYBDD

customer_reviews.title: Not my favorite stride rites.
customer_reviews.text: These don't seem to be as high quality as other stride rite shoes I've purchased. After just a couple of wears, the velcro started tearing.
customer_reviews.author: Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great, sturdy basic sandal
customer_reviews.text: We've ordered this in successive sizes. Looks great, fits & wears well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn Singer

customer_reviews.title: Started strong, fell apart after a month:(
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for sandals that would protect my daughter's toes, unfortunately the inside of the shoe has shredded and fallen apart after only 1 month of use. Very disappointed in the quality of these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Domokim2468

customer_reviews.title: Never hurts their feet and wears till they grow out of them.
customer_reviews.text: Sent to my granddaughter for her 2nd birthday. Fits fine. and very cute. No worries with stride rite.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. They fit true to size and the natural leather doesn't blister her feet the way that synthetics do. So far, they're holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: cseim

customer_reviews.title: They are cute and comfortable for her
customer_reviews.text: This is the second summer that I buy these sandals for my girl. They are cute and comfortable for her, and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: nmc

customer_reviews.title: cute but didn't quite work
customer_reviews.text: They're cute and they look comfortable but the straps in the back didn't hold my child's feet. Her ankles would move around way too much and it didn't seem safe. returned.
customer_reviews.author: T. L.Top Contributor: Sewing

customer_reviews.title: Best summer sandals
customer_reviews.text: My third pair for my 3 year old daughter - have purchased them each Spring. Velcro so easy for her to get on and off and look adorable with a sundress. Can be dressed up or down
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Cole

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals. Comfortable, durable, and they go with everything!
customer_reviews.author: K. Freeh

customer_reviews.title: Feminine, durable sandal
customer_reviews.text: Dainty summer sandal. The sandal blistered my daughter’s feet, so I recommend initially wearing the shoe with thin socks.
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Klingensmith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat large, but sandals seem consistent with Stride Rite quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Neal

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect summer shoes for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect summer shoes for my daughter. She wears them almost every day. They've held up well to her rough play so far!
customer_reviews.author: B. W.

customer_reviews.title: Run big
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful but at least 1 size too large. We love them though, so we are keeping them for when they do eventually fit!
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice shoe. I dont love the sole. The SRT sole is better.
customer_reviews.author: Jazmine

customer_reviews.title: The are adorable with spring/summer dresses
customer_reviews.text: These sandals are everything I was looking for. I ordered a size up which might not have been necessary. The are adorable with spring/summer dresses.
customer_reviews.author: LeslieMe

customer_reviews.title: great shoes
customer_reviews.text: stride rite sandals are the only shoes my daughter can use. I'm not over exaggerating when i say she tried on 60 different pairs of shoes and all of them hurt except these.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes and she wears them all the time. They've held up really well for how much she's been wearing them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher J. Zamora

customer_reviews.title: The sandals are adorable & fit my daughter perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are adorable & fit my daughter perfectly! They seem to be comfortable for her & pretty durable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect summer sandal
customer_reviews.text: I have gotten these for my six year old daughter every summer since she started walking. The quality and value can't be beat! Will continue to buy them until she is too big to wear them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These 7 1/2 W are as advertized.
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect, I have trouble finding shoes for toddlers chubby little feet. These sandals did not cut or rub. They are easy to get on and so comfortable she leaves them on!
customer_reviews.author: Martha I.

customer_reviews.title: Stride Rite never fails
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful everyday summer sandal. Both of my girls wear these shoes without any complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, quality shoes
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, quality shoes. Easy to clean, true to size. Bought them for my toddler and they go with everything. I would buy them again. Can’t go wrong with StrideRite!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Neal

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these because we has another pair and they are my daughter's favorite show
customer_reviews.author: CRHJR

customer_reviews.title: Bought these for my granddaughter easy to strap with the velcro and buckle makes it ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my granddaughter easy to strap with the velcro and buckle makes it look genuine. Super soft soles!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Klein

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sandals
customer_reviews.text: I loved the sandals. Always happy with Stride Rite. But I needed extra wide and unfortunately there weren't any available in extra wide
customer_reviews.author: Granny

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and love the practicality of the closed toe ...
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and love the practicality of the closed toe and the sneaky velcro strap (the buckle is for show!). They run a bit big. Have to return for smaller size.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: Sad that they didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: Cute,soft and ture to size. Sad that they didn't fit
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sandal worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals bought two pairs for each of my girls because they are the perfect spring/summer shoe for them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and style
customer_reviews.text: It's comfortable, can dress up or down. My 5 year old loves it. I would buy it again and recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: Marina Ataie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are beautiful but they fit snug on my daughter's wide feet.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, 6 year old daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: Super cute, 6 year old daughter loves them. She plays hard in them too - they can take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: James P.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: They fit and is so comfortable, my daughter can run and walk in these for days!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Fat feet unite! :)
customer_reviews.text: DD has extra wide feet and these worked perfectly for her school dance
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love these sandals very flexible, protective for her little toes and comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: M&MCharlie

customer_reviews.title: Great for summer!
customer_reviews.text: Well made. Very supportive while being flexible for toddler foot. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Great Sandals
customer_reviews.text: Love these! My 4.5 year old has narrow feet and they fit her great! Not falling off, as a lot of sandals do. Great Stride Rite quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amy D. Stout

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: The sandals are really cute, I ordered a toddler size 5, but the size runs larger than expected.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great! My daughter loves them and they go with everything.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Shiver

customer_reviews.title: good for little chubby feet
customer_reviews.text: so cute, comfy, and high quality! good for little chubby feet.
customer_reviews.author: Yajaira Vasco

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were great! My Grandaughter loved them. I get them every summer!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful sandals. The fit is perfect. They are comfortable and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable, and cute. No complaints from my 4 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Last and very good shoe ..
customer_reviews.text: No problem with anything ...stride rite can sell itself veryy good comfortable shoes ..
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: like, not love them
customer_reviews.text: really cute, but not as wide as expected. i ordered a wide but they were still a little narrow for my taste. overall cute shoe
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Love the shoe, but...
customer_reviews.text: It's been difficult to get an accurate foot measurement on a busy toddler and equate that to a shoe size. Amazon was very helpful with organizing a return.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Rouse

customer_reviews.title: Since the majority of the stores are closing, I ...
customer_reviews.text: Since the majority of the stores are closing, I was able to find these sandals on Amazon. The problem was knowing what size my daughter is. I bought her a size 5 since I was told by the Stride employee after measuring her feet that she was a size 5. I received the sandals and are cute and you can see the cushion on them, but unfortunately they were too big.
customer_reviews.author: E. Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Stride Rite Summer Time Sandal (Toddler/Little Kid)
product_meta.description:
Girls' sandal with adjustable closure

Stride Rite designs and engineers footwear specifically to meet the needs of growing children. Stride Rite's mission is to encourage kids and support parents by developing and marketing products that help children embrace life's possibilities and adventures with confidence. Stride Rite shoes aren't like any other shoes you'll buy. They're better. With more than 85 years of experience, they've learned a few things about their craft. Stride Rite is the one company that's been helping kids run, jump, leap, grow, and playfully express themselves since 1919.
feature_bullets: Girl's dressy fisherman sandal with easy-on adjustable strap
Memory foam insole for enhanced comfort
